assertions.agentProfile: key-to-an-agentProfile existing in dispatch .config -> this has a well-defined structure understandable by dispatch (public-key, private-key ..)
assertions.toolProfile: key-to-a-toolProfile existing in dispatch .config -> could refer to any structure or to an existing cid (dispatch either understands 'ipld:existingtoolcid' or just publishes the whole structure and links it as a new toolLink)

assertions.agentProfile: key-to-an-agentProfile existing in dispatch .config -> this has a well-defined structure understandable by dispatch (public-key, private-key ..)
assertions.toolProfile: key-to-a-toolProfile existing in dispatch .config -> could refer to any structure or to an existing cid (dispatch either understands 'ipld:existingtoolcid' or just publishes the whole structure and links it as a new toolLink)

plus_succ.content: forall M N K, plus M N K -> plus M (s N) (s K)

plus_comm.content: forall M N K, nat K -> plus M N K -> plus N M K
